    Quick Tips

    • Vendor codes should be unique and descriptive (e.g., DELL001, MS001)
    • Ensure all contact information is current and verified
    • Business registration numbers help with legal compliance
    • Mark vendors as "Preferred" for priority consideration
    • Use specialization field to describe vendor expertise
    • Service categories help with vendor categorization
